meaningMnemonic: The thing you use to <kanji>teach</kanji> a <kanji>course</kanji> with <kanji>writing</kanji>s is a <vocabulary>textbook</vocabulary>. It's a book of writings you use to teach your course!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
